name: document_id
description: Reference to master table.  Join using this and Good_through_date

name: reference_by_crfn
description: The CRFN of the cross-referenced doc, if it has one.

name: reference_by_doc_id
description: The Document ID of the cross-referenced doc.

name: reference_by_reel_year
description: Part of the Reel ID of the cross-referenced doc, if it has one.

name: reference_by_reel_borough
description: Part of the Reel ID of the cross-referenced doc, if it has one.

name: reference_by_reel_nbr
description: Part of the Reel ID of the cross-referenced doc, if it has one.

name: reference_by_reel_page
description: Part of the Reel ID of the cross-referenced doc, if it has one.

name: good_through_date
description: Join with master using this plus Document ID.
